p: The antimicrobial studies for the extracts were performed using MRSA (obtained from Medical Microbiology Laboratory, Bharathidasan University, Tiruchirappalli, India). MRSA was grown on mannitol sorbitol agar medium (selective differential medium with high sodium chloride content) for further studies [ 47]. The antibiotic susceptibility of the MRSA isolated strain was tested against antibiotics such as Vancomycin and Ciprofloxacin.
